text:
Swelling or pain in the abdomen or swelling in the legs caused by blood clots
                
Blood in the urine
                
Headaches
                
Jaundice (a yellowish color of the skin or whites of the eyes)
                
In people who have aplastic anemia and PNH, either condition can develop first.",NHLBI,Aplastic Anemia
How to diagnose Aplastic Anemia ?,"Your doctor will diagnose aplastic anemia based on your medical and family histories, a physical exam, and test result
